articles.title: Stuart Broad makes England cricket history as he claims landmark 600th Test wicket...
articles.description: Stuart Broad claimed a landmark 600th Test wicket on the first day of the fourth Ashes Test at Old Trafford. The fast bowler dismissed Australia’s Travis Head, who pulled Broad’s bounce…
articles.content: Stuart Broad claimed a landmark 600th Test wicket on the first day of the fourth Ashes Test at Old Trafford. The fast bowler dismissed Australia's Travis Head, who pulled Broad's bouncer straight in… [+1066 chars]

articles.title: England bowler Broad takes 600th Test wicket
articles.description: England's Stuart Broad becomes just the second pace bowler to take 600 wickets in Test cricket after removing Australia's Travis Head in the fourth Ashes Test.
articles.content: England's Stuart Broad has become just the second pace bowler to take 600 wickets in Test cricket. Broad, 36, reached the mark by removing Australia's Travis Head on day one of the fourth Ashes Test… [+2850 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
